content: I think I'll set up a few stations with different games and activities, so everyone can rotate and try out different things. I'll also make sure to have plenty of snacks and drinks available. By the way, speaking of family, my sister just got engaged last weekend, and we had a big celebration at a restaurant. It was amazing to see everyone so happy and relieved that they're finally taking the next step. My parents are thrilled, and my mom has already started making wedding plans.
